      • CellWithTargets

        CellWithTargets(NewCell targetCell,
                java.util.ArrayList<Player> targets,
                int maxTargetsInCell,
                int minTargetsInCell,
                boolean canMoveYourselfHere,
                boolean canMoveOthersHere)
        class used to control for the target system
        Parameters:
        targetCell - cell in exam
        targets - players that are targets
        maxTargetsInCell - max possible target
        minTargetsInCell - min possible targets
        canMoveYourselfHere - says if it's possible to move in targetCell
        canMoveOthersHere - says if it's possible to move other players in targetCell
